communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Acknowledge setbacks, celebrate small steps, avoid preaching.

narratives.c_essay: I've been on a journey to leave harmful communities behind, and it's been tough but rewarding. I started a blog to share my progress and connect with others on similar paths. Reading and reviewing books has been therapeutic, and collaborating with publishers has opened new doors. I'm here to support and share resources, celebrating every small step forward together.
narratives.p_intro: Hi, I'm recovery_0008_9211a8, your recovery helper. I share my journey of leaving harmful communities and offer support to others. Let's celebrate our progress and share resources to keep moving forward together.
